channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole, 15th September
item.description:
Deep pothole on side of road - has been here for a couple of months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 Potholes at the junction with Suffolk Road and Montpellier Villas, 15th September
item.description:
Highways workmen arrived on Thursday 14 September to fill in the potholes. As can be seen from the photos only ONE pothole has been repaired. This is contrary to the Highways Customer Service Team who sent an email this morning stating that all of the five potholes had been repaired. This is clearly incorrect.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Montpellier Villas, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole on SB carriageway L1 near brown "Regency" sign, 15th September
item.description:
Deep pothole on left hand side of lane 1, near to brown "Regency Cheltenham" sign. Unable to be specific on exact location due to shock of hitting it and subsequent damage to wheel forcing us to exit motorway at junction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Falling Tree obstructing the footpath/bridleway, 14th September
item.description:
This tree is very low across footpath/bridleway. It is in danger of falling completely and potentially causing injury to walkers or horse riders. I believe it has been been reported before directly to PROW department. To find it, from Brockhampton Lane end, take footpath, cross railway line, (CAREFULLY), then continue over first bridge. It is 30/40 metres from there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to grass verges, 14th September
item.description:
Following recent work by telecoms, the grass verges have been left without grass and covered in mud.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Ewens Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to grass verges, 14th September
item.description:
Following recent work by telecoms, the grass verges have been left without grass and covered in mud.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Ewens Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham

item.title: Reported in August sign still missing, 14th September
item.description:
The 3 marker indicator come off sign Reported via Android in the Damage to Sign (NH) category anonymously at 23:31, Sunday 6 August 2023 Sent to National Highways less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 4864528. The marker as you come off at 11a where it goes ||| || |, the 3 one has come of the post.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown vegetation, 14th September
item.description:
The vegetation is now spilling onto private property and blocking water flows. This clearing was on a maintenance schedule but has not been done for some time and the trees and vegetation are growing and blocking the flow of water off the motorway into the flow tubes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Upton St. Leonards, Stroud
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrow bramble hedge, 14th September
item.description:
There is a large overgrown hedge with brambles coming out onto the pavement causing a nuisance and injury.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pound Close, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed drain outside 54 Moorend Crescent, 14th September
item.description:
Drain cover on road has badly collapsed and looks dangerous. Problem located outside 54 Mooorend crescent, though due to parking situation in the road it is only visible when cars are not parked over it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Moorend Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 20 potholes over 4cm in depth from Yew Tree Cottage to Butlers Farm, 13th September
item.description:
These potholes have been here since April and are growing by the day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elkstone, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ongoing/Worsening problem - previously reported, 13th September
item.description:
This hole/drainage point has previously been reported, it has been marked with an arrow and at one stage, was cordoned off with barriers. But nothing has ever been done, Fix My Street have continually asked me if the problem has been rectified - which it hasn't - and it is now worsening. It is now a genuine hazard. We, at the BID, are happy to chase up elsewhere if we can be told whose responsibility this is?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Winchcombe Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 13th September
item.description:
This rubbish has been dumped recently

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fiddlers Green Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken manhole, 13th September
item.description:
There is a large cast iron manhole that appears to have sunk in the road surface and/or is not sitting true in its frame. Movement and very loud clanking noise is occurring when vehicles are passing over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip hazard paving slab by school gate, 13th September
item.description:
The paving slab by the school gate is sticking up an inch or so and is a trip hazard for both parents and kids, particularly when on scooters/bikes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Scholars Court, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees overgrown obstructing pavement, 13th September
item.description:
Hey, A tree next to Millennium Bridge has overgrown to obstruct walking on the pavement and having to walk in the road to avoid. Thanks, Nick
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint James' Roundabout, St Paulâ€™s, Cheltenham

item.title: Broken Dog Poo Bin, 12th September
item.description:
There's a broken dog poo bin here - it's left open constantly, giving off the smells from within !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grafitti'd bus stop, 12th September
item.description:
Heavily grafitti'd bus stop needs cleaning and returning to normal look please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation obscuring road markings, 11th September
item.description:
Hilgay Lodge, which borders Tudor Lodge Road, has a lot of vegetation growing out of the fence and into the road. This obscures sight lines for pedestrians, cyclists and cars, and is also covering up some double yellow lines. I have written to the owner to ask if they might cut back some of the bushes but I feel it would be useful for someone from the relevant council department to come and assess the situation and ensure the vegetation is managed on a regular basis.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Lodge Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing cover from inspection hatch., 11th September
item.description:
Missing cover to hatch is a trip hazard which could cause significant injury. What 3 Words: Firm Share Plug

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Beni Close, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
